title: Jerry Inman
text:
Jerry Franklin Inman (born February 4, 1940, <a href="Manhattan%2C%20Kansas">Manhattan, Kansas</a>) is a former American college and professional <a href="American%20football">football</a> player.
Inman played as a defensive lineman for the <a href="University%20of%20Oregon">University of Oregon</a>, and then for the <a href="Denver%20Broncos">Denver Broncos</a> in both the <a href="American%20Football%20League">American Football League</a> and <a href="NFL">NFL</a> from <a href="1966%20AFL%20season">1966</a>-1973. In 1974 and 1975, he played for the <a href="Portland%20Storm">Portland Storm</a> and the <a href="Portland%20Thunder">Portland Thunder</a> of the <a href="World%20Football%20League">World Football League</a>.
